name: twitterer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who publishes short remarks or pieces of information on the social media service Twitter: He is an online journalist, editor, and Twitterer with Canada's national newspaper, the Globe and Mail. Taking a guess at the demographics of twitterers compared to the nation, I'm guessing older people and poorer people will be severely underrepresented. Synonym
tweeter
More examplesFewer examplesWhile Facebook's audience was ageing, Twitterers were getting younger.The article mentions tools for measuring the influence of twitterers.Twitterers are making traditional bloggers seem verbose and archaic.
